promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a gigantic special wolf normal-type pokemon wearing regal armor. It can be found in field-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, normal or wolf. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Armogrin, a a gigantic special wolf normal-type pokemon. It can be found in field-like environments It has the following abilities: Lazy Headbutt, Grand Loop. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "wolf", "normal" or "Armogrin". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of normal-type pokemon, wolf-like, special, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, faded prismatic bokeh background
generatedDescription: Living among meadows, this lazy-headed titan uses its Grand Loop power to play with the wind. Its enormous size notably contradicts its playful, docile nature.
